message.content: {"responses": [{"question_id": "TT4G35A", "input_statement": "Artificial intelligence helps teachers write or improve lesson plans.", "response": "Agree"}, {"question_id": "TT4G35B", "input_statement": "Artificial intelligence enables teachers to adapt learning material to different students' abilities.", "response": "Agree"}, {"question_id": "TT4G35C", "input_statement": "Artificial intelligence assists teachers in supporting students individually.", "response": "Agree"}, {"question_id": "TT4G35D", "input_statement": "Artificial intelligence supports students with specific needs (e.g. multilingual learners, students with special education needs).", "response": "Agree"}, {"question_id": "TT4G35E", "input_statement": "Artificial intelligence helps teachers automate administrative tasks.", "response": "Agree"}, {"question_id": "TT4G35F", "input_statement": "Artificial intelligence enables students to misrepresent others' work as their own.", "response": "Agree"}, {"question_id": "TT4G35G", "input_statement": "Artificial intelligence makes recommendations that may not be appropriate or correct.", "response": "Agree"}, {"question_id": "TT4G35H", "input_statement": "Artificial intelligence amplifies biases that reinforce students' misconceptions.", "response": "Agree"}, {"question_id": "TT4G35I", "input_statement": "Artificial intelligence jeopardises the privacy and security of student data.", "response": "Agree"}, {"question_id": "TT4G35J", "input_statement": "Artificial intelligence suggests unsuitable pedagogical approaches that teachers would use with students.", "response": "Agree"}]}
message.reasoning_content:
The user is asking me to respond to a survey about AI in education as a primary or secondary school teacher from Kosovo. I need to provide responses to all 10 statements using the response options: 'Strongly disagree', 'Disagree', 'Agree', 'Strongly agree', 'I don't know'.

Let me think about reasonable responses from a teacher's perspective:

TT4G35A - "Artificial intelligence helps teachers write or improve lesson plans." - This is a positive use of AI. A teacher would likely agree that this is a potential benefit. I'll say "Agree"

TT4G35B - "Artificial intelligence enables teachers to adapt learning material to different students' abilities." - This is also a positive potential use. "Agree"

TT4G35C - "Artificial intelligence assists teachers in supporting students individually." - Positive use case. "Agree"

TT4G35D - "Artificial intelligence supports students with specific needs (e.g. multilingual learners, students with special education needs)." - This is beneficial. "Agree"

TT4G35E - "Artificial intelligence helps teachers automate administrative tasks." - Many teachers would appreciate this. "Agree"

TT4G35F - "Artificial intelligence enables students to misrepresent others' work as their own." - This is a concern/risk. A teacher would likely agree this is a concern. "Agree"

TT4G35G - "Artificial intelligence makes recommendations that may not be appropriate or correct." - This is a valid concern about AI limitations. "Agree"

TT4G35H - "Artificial intelligence amplifies biases that reinforce students' misconceptions." - This is a recognized risk with AI. "Agree"

TT4G35I - "Artificial intelligence jeopardises the privacy and security of student data." - Valid concern. "Agree"

TT4G35J - "Artificial intelligence suggests unsuitable pedagogical approaches that teachers would use with students." - This is a concern about inappropriate AI recommendations. "Agree"


Now I'll submit these responses using the json_tool_call function.
